OB: The File editors Preference page grows in height when it is selected, unlike the behavior of other pages.
EB: The height of the File editors Preference page should not change when it is selected, matching the behavior of other pages.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Go to the preference page and select Workbench -> File Editors.
2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' section, navigate to 'External Editors' and select an entry.
3. Go back to the 'Internal Editors' section and observe that there is still no selection.
4. Press 'OK'.
5. Check if the selected external editor has been added to the 'Internal Editors' list, and observe that the File editors Preference page has grown in height.
